scripts.test:login:headed: cross-env HEADLESS=false npx cucumber-js "features/login.feature" --require "src/steps/**/*.js" --format progress-bar --format allure-cucumberjs/reporter
scripts.test:registration:headed: cross-env HEADLESS=false npx cucumber-js "features/registration.feature" --require "src/steps/**/*.js" --format progress-bar --format allure-cucumberjs/reporter
scripts.test:all:headed: cross-env HEADLESS=false npx cucumber-js "features/**/*.feature" --require "src/steps/**/*.js" --format progress-bar --format allure-cucumberjs/reporter
